original_text: But I am the one who removes your sins when you do not obey me. I, the Lord, do that, because of who I am. I do not hold your sins in my mind. But I am the one who removes your sins when you do not obey me. I, the Lord, do that, because of who I am. I do not hold your sins in my mind. But I am the one who removes your sins
korean_text: 나 곧 나는 나를 위하여 네 허물을 도말하는 자니 네 죄를 기억하지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: But I am the one who removes your sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 너의 죄를 없애는 자이다

sentences.original_text: when you do not obey me
I do not hold your sins in my mind
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 죄를 마음에 담아두지 않노라

sentences.original_text: But I am the one who removes your sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 너의 죄를 없애는 자이다

sentences.original_text: when you do not obey me
I do not hold your sins in my mind
